mapper.select: SELECT SEAT_NO, COORDI_X AS coordiX, COORDI_Y AS coordiY, CONDITION, SEAT_AVAIL FROM SEAT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEAT (SEAT_NO, COORDI_X, COORDI_Y, CONDITION) VALUES (#{seatNo}, #{coordiX}, #{coordiY}, #{condition})
mapper.select: SELECT s.SEAT_NO FROM RENT_SEAT rs JOIN SEAT s ON rs.SEAT_NO2 = s.SEAT_NO WHERE rs.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND s.CONDITION = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE RENT_SEAT SET READING_DONE = READING_DONE + INTERVAL '4' HOUR, READING_EXTEND = READING_EXTEND - 1 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND READING_EXTEND > 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENT_SEAT WHERE SEAT_NO2 = #{seatNo} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || #{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BETWEEN READING_START AND READING_DONE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEAT WHERE CONDITION = 0 AND SEAT_NO <= #{seatNo}
SELECT READING_START AS readingStart, READING_DONE AS readingDone, READING_EXTEND AS readingExtend FROM RENT_SEAT rs WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SEAT_SPACE_BOOKING WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SPACE_NO IS NULL
